title: Plat 4 LFT (adc,support main)
body:
Hey I'm currently in plat4 and wanting to join a team with voice communication..
Champ pool:
ADC: Graves, Corki, Sivir, Caitlyn, Jinx
Support: Janna, Morgana

replies.body:
Hey man am highly interested in you being on our team theres a link right here if you're interested...

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/MIAPlElt-looking-for-goldplat-players-from-season-4-and-willing-to-start-a-semi-serious-ranked-team
